data.text:
@subzerov690 @davenewworld_2 TSA Security.  I'll bet you money he had to wear a mask to do that, and he was also likely instructed, wearing a mask or not.

He was then instructed while getting on the plane.

When we see the video, he is NOT wearing a mask.

How many times does this effing infant need to be /
RT @ConanOBrien: When I wear a mask on a plane I get special treatment because everyone thinks I’m Jane Lynch.

I had the misfortune of sitting across the isle from one of these jerks.  Wouldn’t put his mask back on, blathering all the typical ‘poor me’ BS, the whole plane was delayed 30 minutes at landing.  Can’t fine them enough IMO. #antivaxxers #COVIDIOTS

Yet, today, our President focused his attention on vaccinating the "unvaxxed."  Criticized the "unvaxxed."  Denigrated the "unvaxxed."  

And then told everyone we need to test kids.  And fine ppl for not wearing a mask on a plane.
RT @katherineOma: The TSA will double the fines of those refusing to wear a mask on a plane and  Biden said “Show some respect!”
@espiers Put the oxygen mask on your face first and then help people around you. Not to be too cynical, but if you’re on a plane, you can’t help someone on a bus.

RT @louisaclary: Have to visit Wen's page for her tyrannical take on Biden's message & how she sees next steps:
👉Vac mandates for plane/tra…

@VanessaMarie_87 @ksavitt @POTUS You better hope I never sit next to you on a plane. You won dumbest comment. Wait till some stupid shit like this happens to you. As a matter fact I would wake you up and tell you to put your mask up, Just so I don’t have to see your face.
All of this because you wouldn’t wear a mask on the plane. Fam your girl has an underlying condition. What a bum. https://t.co/2kZWXeHuIj

@davenewworld_2 Why is it always a white person freaking out on a plane over covid mask mandates? I wish I could be alive a hundred years from now when white privilege has had some time to settle into being the minority of the world population!
@Niftybergin @davenewworld_2 Exactly. FFS, they know a mask is required. STFU and get off the plane. Zero tolerance is right. Enough is enough with these ignorant assholes.
@Lawrence I don't get how they throw a fit and refuse on the plane.. When airports have a mask mandate???  You can't walk through without it.
@mmpadellan How in the world did this guy not know he needed a mask on a plane?  Was he held captive in a dark basement for the last 18 months?

@lindyli @kirkacevedo There are ppl that will wear the mask until the plane takes off. Then what can be done at that point?  People have to be vaccinated; having valid proof before boarding and still wear a mask during flight.
RT @factsonlyplse: @Spicy_Heathen @davenewworld_2 They got a warning when they purchased tickets (mask policy) they got warnings when enter…

@reuniteloveones @natashakorecki The EU re- added the US on the list of countries not allowed in last week because of the surge due to unvaccinated 80 millions US citizens. Talk to them. The Government did its job. Go talk to the crazies who refuse to wear a mask on board a plane. FFS.
@ArtSayles @SethAMandel oh boy here we go...every kid/adult on a plane has to wear a mask and is berated if they don't. he's turning it into an anti-semitism thing when its not
You’re not gonna get thrown off a plane for not having a mask on your two year old, Jeanine. https://t.co/1lxYzuOa6R

sitting on a plane that’s delayed for 30 mins the dude behind me won’t put on a mask. i feel like my moment to go viral on the internet is back on the horizon. fingers crossed!!!
